SmallSlider 图片轮播插件

引入文件

JS

$('#exp1').smallslider();

html

<div id="exp1" class="smallslider">
  <ul>
	 <li><a href="#" target="_blank"><img src="rs/images/001.jpg" title="" alt="图片标题1" /></a></li>
	 <li><a href="#" target="_blank"><img src="rs/images/002.jpg" title="" alt="图片标题2" /></a></li>
	 <li><a href="#" target="_blank"><img src="rs/images/003.jpg" title="" alt="图片标题3" /></a></li>
  </ul>
</div>

css

#exp1 {
	width: 320px;
	height: 240px;
}

DEMO地址

http://www.cssue.com/demo/small-slider/index.html
